a4f7023581efda508b249675dcee1daf (17:09): mxs, i followed the instructions on your howto, the certificate itself seems to be okay now, but apache still doesn't run, error_log is showing this message: [error] Illegal attempt to re-initialise SSL for server (theoretically shouldn't happen!)
898e82c94d7703e96f7ea83b31e0ac2b (17:10): dmaphy: do you stop and start apache, or use restart/graceful ?
a4f7023581efda508b249675dcee1daf (17:10): service httpd start or restart
a4f7023581efda508b249675dcee1daf (17:10): cause it didn't run before
898e82c94d7703e96f7ea83b31e0ac2b (17:11): it sounds like an error that would come up with graceful or restart, that's why I ask
898e82c94d7703e96f7ea83b31e0ac2b (17:11): maybe multiple configurations of ssl in your config files ?
a4f7023581efda508b249675dcee1daf (17:12): i think there is just one in /etc/httpd/conf.d/ssl.conf, but i'll check again O.o
a4f7023581efda508b249675dcee1daf (17:14): wtf, now it runs o.O
a4f7023581efda508b249675dcee1daf (17:15): i just uncommented some text in the <Location /> Directive, but i think it worked before too
a4f7023581efda508b249675dcee1daf (17:16): can be, that this error occurs, if httpd is not running and im calling it with restart?
a4f7023581efda508b249675dcee1daf (17:19): mh, okay, thanks for your help mxs :)
09d652b82773da658a81562c0eba15ca (17:25): mxs: sorted my porblem - didn't really do anything. just tried starting apache again and it worked

61f77cea42edc2536c0c407d52cf8b76 (17:26): Question:  My web host company runs apache with my username - I want to duplicate that on my dev server - I thought I remember somebody saying that's not wise from a security standpoint -- any comments?
31e74eb1ace03f70b20fc58edb2c404b (17:28): is the daemopn process really running with your username?
31e74eb1ace03f70b20fc58edb2c404b (17:28): or only the DocumentRoot has you as owner and/or group?
61f77cea42edc2536c0c407d52cf8b76 (17:29): on the web host -- not 100% sure
61f77cea42edc2536c0c407d52cf8b76 (17:30): but I know that files set with permisions that only I should be able to modify - apache can modify
b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (17:46): Budget cuts forced us to sell all the power cords for the servers.
